typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{_col0_} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 derive(url = regexSplit({_col0_},'download.microsoft.com')) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 foldDown(unroll(url, url),
	mapColumn(
		{_col0_},
		url
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Flatten1
Flatten1 keyGenerate(output(rownbr as long),
	startAt: 1L,
	stepValue: 1L) ~> SurrogateKey1
SurrogateKey1 filter(rownbr == 2) ~> Filter1
Filter1 derive(url2 = regexSplit(url,'.json"')) ~> DerivedColumn2
Flatten2 keyGenerate(output(rownbr2 as long),
	startAt: 1L,
	stepValue: 1L) ~> SurrogateKey2
SurrogateKey2 filter(rownbr2 == 1) ~> Filter2
DerivedColumn2 foldDown(unroll(url2, url2),
	mapColumn(
		{_col0_},
		url,
		rownbr,
		url2
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Flatten2
Filter2 derive(url3 = concat(ltrim(url2,'/'),'.json')) ~> DerivedColumn3
DerivedColumn3 select(mapColumn(
		url3
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['jsonlink.txt'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	store: 'cache',
	format: 'inline',
	output: true,
	saveOrder: 1,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> relativeURL
